The unique formula in Colgate®Total®contains a combination of ingredients which attach to your teeth and gums after you brush, forming a protective barrier that keeps working between brushings. This barrier provides 12 hour non-stop protection even when you eat or drink. Brush twice daily with Colgate®Total®and your whole mouth is protected for 12 hours. How does Colgate®Total®work to provide non-stop protection? Brushing with Colgate®Total®forms a protective anti-bacterial barrier on your teeth and gums that protects against the re-growth of plaque for 12 hours. This is due to the unique formula in Colgate®Total®containing an antibacterial ingredient which is retained on the tooth surface and the gums by a copolymer. It protects you for 12 hours each time you brush, against dental plaque and gum problems and does not get washed away even when you eat or drink. What is the clinical evidence to support the efficacy of Colgate®Total®? Colgate®Total®has extensive clinical support with over 80 published studies done with more than 19,000 subjects. This outstanding clinical record is also documented by the fact that Colgate®Total®is supported by different scientific review publications written by independent dental experts (e.g. Blinkhorn publication in BDJ, 2009). Dentist recommended brand. Clinically proven relief and daily protection for sensitive teeth. Powered by Novamin. With fluoride. Why use Sensodyne Repair&Protect? It is possible to treat the pain of sensitive teeth and to repair these vulnerable areas. With twice daily use, Sensodyne Repair&Protect continuously repairs, strengthens and protects your teeth. It also has a fresh minty taste to leave your mouth feeling clean and fresh. What is tooth sensitivity? Sensitivity occurs when the dentine underneath tooth enamel becomes exposed. When exposed dentine comes into contact with hot or cold, sweet, sour or even your toothbrush it can trigger the nerve, causing a short sharp pain. Novamin®formula releases the building blocks of teeth: calcium and phosphate. These ions from a protective mineral layer to repair the vulnerable areas of the tooth. How does Sensodyne Repair&Protect work? Sensodyne Repair&Protect with Novamin®is different from other toothpastes. It has a unique, clinically proven concentrated calcium formula that helps repair vulnerable areas with the natural building blocks of your teeth. Dentist recommended brand*. *Dentists recommended Sensodyne brand.

With extracts of 100% natural origin. Dermatologically tested. Palmolive 'Nourishing Delight' Shower Milk is enriched with moisturizing milk and extracts of 100% natural origin of honey and aloe vera, as well as with a vitamin complex. Its rich velvety formula helps to nourish your skin.

Instant&lasting relief. Clinically proven Pro-Argin formula. Freedom to forget about the pain of sensitive teeth! Fluoride toothpaste. Colgate®Sensitive Pro-Relief\u2122. An exclusive Pro-Argin\u2122 formula with a technology that dental professionals use on their patients to provide sensitivity relief. Where does sensitive tooth pain come from? Receding gum and damage to your enamel can expose thousands of microscopic channels which lead to your tooth's nerve centre. When your teeth make contact with something hot, cold or sweet, sensations are carried down these channels directly to the nerves, causing pain. How does Colgate®Sensitive Pro-Relief\u2122 work? Most other sensitive toothpastes primarily numb the pain. Colgate®Sensitive Pro-Relief\u2122 works by plugging the channels that lead to sensitive tooth nerves, to block the pain. With regular use, it builds a long-lasting protective barrier that acts like a seal against sensitivity. Colgate®Sensitive Pro-Relief\u2122. Tooth sensitivity is never fun, especially when it is caused by your favourite food and drink, be it hot, cold, sweet or acidic. Many adults in Britain suffer from tooth sensitivity. The condition occurs when enamel erosion and gum recession expose thousands of channels that lead to the tooth's nerve centre. When you drink something cold, hot, sweet or acidic, sensations are carried down these channels causing pain. Common causes. Tooth sensitivity is not uncommon and can result from many factors, some more obvious than others. You might want to look out for the following: Gum recession: the exposure in the roots of the teeth is a common problem in adults over the age of 40. Brushing incorrectly: Improper brushing can damage your gum tissue. Abrasive toothpaste: This can cause enamel to thin and reveal the dentine underneath. Acidic beverages: Fizzy drinks and even fruit juices can cause heavy enamel erosion. Gum disease: Gums can become swollen, sore or infected which can lead to gum recession. A chipped or fractured tooth: Usually characterised by a sharp pain due to biting pressure. How Pro-Argin\u2122 can help. Ordinary toothpastes work by numbing the pain. However, pain triggers can still reach the nerves via the open tubules. Pro-Argin\u2122 plugs and seals dentine tubules, which helps block pain triggers to deliver instant* and lasting relief. Colgate®Sensitive Pro-Relief\u2122 is clinically proven to provide instant* relief and lasting protection from tooth sensitivity \u2013 there is no other product which is more effective. The toothpaste contains arginine, a naturally-occurring amino acid, which, when combined with Calcium Carbonate, blocks and seals the microscopic channels that lead to your tooth nerve centre. *When applied to each sensitive tooth for one minute

Our oil comes from sustainable sources of oily fish, such as sardines, renowned for their naturally higher level of EPA. Independent testing ensures our oils comply with stringent EC purity rules. What you won't find in Equazen\u2122 eye q®family capsules. No Aspartame, Saccharine, Artificial flavours, Artificial colours. The essential facts. Essential fatty acids, such as Omega-3 and Omega-6, are vital for good health. They play a role in almost every cell of your body. Oily fish are a great source of the important Omega-3 fatty acids EPA and DHA. However, many people are not eating enough. Peach and raspberry flavour sweets with liquid centres. With real peach&raspberry juice. Suitable for vegetarians. Delicious sweets with a soothing and refreshing liquid centre. Siblings Norman S. Hall and Thomas H. Hall founded the business in 1893 to produce soap and jams, but ventured into the confectionery market in 1918 when their premises moved to Whitefield. . The company began manufacturing Halls Mentholyptus in 1927, made from a blend of menthol and eucalyptus oil. This humble sweet became the world\u2019s best known and best-selling cough drop, and helped the company float on the stock market for the first time in 1953, a year before sweet rationing came to an end in the UK. The company was not without its challenges in the post-war years. Sugar shortages and supply problems with menthol crystals and eucalyptus oil from China, Brazil and Spain meant that the average weekly production had dropped from 800 tonnes a week to just 80 tonnes a week. However, by the mid-1960\u2019s, Hall\u2019s products accounted for about a third of the entire UK market for medicated sweets. Innovations included cough drops with a liquid centre, sugar free cough drops and menthol-free sweets.

100% Manuka Honey with extra immune support.The world\u2019s first pure Manuka Honey lozenge made from 100% New Zealand Manuka Honey and Echinacea and Propolis extracts. No added sugar, stabilizers or artificial additives.The lozenge slowly releases honey in the mouth and throat which means that the clinically proven anti-bacterial properties of active Manuka Honey have the recommended five minutes contact time with the area of inflammation and infection.Explaining the activity rating of Manuka Honey: Not all Manuka Honey has unique therapeutic properties. Theactivity rating (e.g. 12+) shows the unique type of antibacterial activity which is naturally present in honey made from the nectar of the Manuka bush (Leptospermum scoparium). The activity numbers for Manuka Honey can be confusing. The golden numbers for anti-bacterial effectiveness are between 10+ and 15+. A rating below 10+ has no proven unique therapeutic benefit whilst honey with extremely high activity levels may have been over-processed.We add extracts of Echinacea which is a herbal remedy well known for supporting the body\u2019s immunity. Propolis is another miraculous product of the hive produced by the bees to protect the hive from infection. It is an age old beekeeper remedy famous for for its antibacterial and antifungal properties.Green Bay Harvest 12+ Manuka Honeysucker Lozenges are designed for:Fighting Infection and inflammation: known to combat over 60 bacteria and fungi, the antibacterial action of manuka honey is highly stable.Mouth and Throat Care: The antiseptic properties help kill bacteria which cause sore throats whilst the honey soothes the throat without numbing it. Many singers and speakers take our lozenges as a vocal care product.Coughs and Colds: Honey is a traditional remedy for coughs and colds particularly when combined with lemon. Sore throats caused by bacterial infections can be soothed by the antibacterial properties in Manuka Honey whilst the honey helps suppress coughing and aid a good night\u2019s sleep.Digestion: By coating and soothing the gastro-intestinal tract, active Manuka Honey shields the gut from damaging conditions such as acid reflux.Non-diabetic Hypoglycemia: Many people snack on biscuits when they feel their blood sugar lever is low. Honeysuckers are an ideal alternative and can easily be kept with you during the day.Child Friendly: These lozenges taste delicious because they are made with pure honey and don\u2019t contain refined sugar or artificial flavourings or additives. So they appeal to children with sore throats and coughs who can safely eat throat lozenges.A note from JoManuka Honey was one of the first foods we started to bring to the UK as it is a perfect example of a natural food with amazing benefits, as well as one that is easy to incorporate into our usual diet.Some time ago, as medical trials continued to prove the value of Manuka Honey I was introduced to a fellow honey lover who was trying to create a patented proce

It also helps to prevent the spread of the fungus&protects against recurrence. It is an effective, caring solution that can be used at home without prescription. What is fungal nail? Fungal nail is surprisingly common; it is an invasion of fungal species underneath the nail. The fungi are passed from person to person by direct contact and are carried by carpets, socks, shoes and hosiery. Is this product right for me? Scholl Fungal Nail Treatment is suitable for treading mild fungal nail conditions.

Everyone recognises sugar-related tooth decay as a major issue in children's oral health. However, dentists are increasingly concerned that the acids in everyday diet, such as fruit and fizzy drinks can cause Acid Wear. Most children's permanent teeth come through between the ages of 6-13. These new teeth along with their milk teeth are vulnerable to attack from acids. These acids soften tooth enamel, over time, making itthinner, weaker and discoloured. Dentists recommend Pronamel toothpaste. It's formulated to protect teeth from the effects of Acid Wear, as it re-hardens and strengthens tooth enamel every time you brush. 100% pure. Product not tested on animals. Suitable for vegans. Tea Tree Oil is known for its purifying effect. The oil cleanses deeply, is colourless and does not sting. The ancient wetlands of subtropical northern New South Wales are the birthplace of Australia's Original Tea Tree Oil company. The indigenous people of Australia have known of the beneficial properties of the oil for thousands of years. In the 1970's Eric White pioneered Australia's Tea Tree Oil industry, realising his dream in the alternately floodwashed and drought-baked Bungawalbyn wetlands of northern New South Wales. After many years of hard work, painstaking research and lobbying, a crown lease was granted. It arrived on a Thursday in 1976... and Thursday Plantation was born. The first bottles of Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Oil were sold at local markets. Using only a kerosene lantern and candles for illumination, the bottles were hand filled and the labels lovingly hand drawn with crayons. The magic of Tea Tree oil can now be found in homes around the world. Look out for Thursday Plantation's Organic Personal Care range in store now. For more information on our range of Tea Tree and other products visit us at www.thursdayplantation.com

product.productDescription: Alcohol free. No preservatives. Yeast and gluten free. Suitable for children. Suitable for vegetarians. Food supplement containing iron and vitamins. Ironvital®F helps fulfil your daily requirement for iron. This essential trace element is needed for red blood cell production, oxygen transport in the muscles. In addition, iron is a component of many enzymes that control metabolic processes within the cells. Ironvital®F helps fulfil your daily requirement for iron and contains iron in Gluconate form. This is absorbed readily by the body especially when taken in combination with vitamin C. The B vitamins contained in Ironvital®F enhance the effects of iron. A traditional Black Forest product - Vitality from nature. Valuable to your health, made from select, pure ingredients from nature, with a pleasant taste. The syrups, tonics and other liquid preparations from Hübner promote body functions, help maintain healthy organs and support people with special dietary needs. They contain tried and tested vital substances, extracts and concentrates from choice herbs and fruit ingredients developed in line with the latest research in nutritional science. Iron provides vital energy. Are you frequently tired? Do you feel listless? Or do you have a pale skin? If so, the cause may be an unbalanced iron supply. This trace element is primarily responsible for the production of red blood cells and vital for the transport of oxygen through the bloodstream. Without iron, the cells and organs are not sufficiently supplied with oxygen, the accelerant for energy metabolism and vital energy. Blood - a source of energy 4.5 to 6 litres of the red liquid of life are incessantly pumped through an adult's veins. The red blood cells perform a vital function. They transport oxygen to even the most locations in our body. To accomplish this, they depend on one particular substance: iron, a vital component of human blood. Iron loss occurs every day through the intestines, the kidneys, the skin, and in women during menstruation, and the requirement for iron is increased during pregnancy and lactation. This iron loss has to be compensated regularly through our food.

Invisible protection transparent spray-on sunscreen SPF 30--High . Absorbs instantly for immediate and effective water resistant protection. 100% invisible with a light, non-greasy texture. UVA/UVB protection system - EU compliant. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved. This invisible protection SPF 30 sunscreen is ideal for people with skin that burns easily. It is 100% invisible so it won't leave streaks, and with its non-greasy texture it doesn't leave skin feeling sticky. Thanks to its spray dispenser, it is incredibly quick and easy to apply and, because it absorbs instantly, it offers immediate protection against harmful UV rays. It's also dermatologically approved. For added reassurance, it's not only water resistant but also guards against both UVA and UVB radiation with SPF 30 and good three star UVA protection. Exposure to the sun's UVA and UVB radiation is the main cause of skin cancer and also leads to premature ageing, so it is vital to use adequate protection. Sunscreens do not provide 100% protection from UV rays, they only allow a reduced number of them through. SPF stands for Sun Protection Factor and measures the amount of UVB radiation that is neutralised by a sunscreen. As a rough guide, the amount of time you can spend in the sun without burning can be multiplied by the SPF of the sunscreen. For example, if you normally start to burn after 10 minutes of sun exposure, this is increased to 300 minutes when using an SPF 30 sunscreen if applied generously and frequently.

Helps stop a cold in its tracks. Clinically proven. Use at the 1st signs. Up to 3 cold attacks. Nasal spray for nasal irrigation. Drug free. Why is it different from other cold products? What does it do? Unlike medicines that help relieve bothersome cold symptoms, First Defence nasal spray works at the first signs of a cold by targeting the viruses to help stop the cold in its tracks before the symptoms get worse. How does it work? When used at the first signs of a cold, First Defence nasal spray acts at the back of the nose directly where the cold virus takes hold and starts to develop (that's why it is a nasal spray). It traps, inactivates and helps your body naturally remove the cold virus, before it develops into a full blown cold. What to expect? When using First Defence nasal spray, you may experience increased nasal discharge (runny nose) or temporary stinging. These are normal signs that the product is working. They are not harmful to your health and will not last for long. Use at the 1st signs of a cold. 1. To help trap. 2. Inactivate. 3. Remove the cold virus. Before it develops into a full blown cold

30 days supply. Help protect joints . For active sports people&older joints. Yeast, sodium salt, sucrose, artificial sweetener, artificial flavour, lactose, preservative, starch and gluten free. Blisterpacked to maintain freshness. High quality ingredients - marine sourced. Food Supplement. One-a-day Glucosamine Sulphate 1500mg. Who should take this product? People who want to take a maximum strength single supplement, pure and simple. Those who take part in sports regularly e.g. Running, Tennis or other physically challenging activity. Those who want to help protect older healthy joints. About Glucosamine... Jointflex products are all based on glucosamine across the range because it is well known to support healthy joints. This is because... It is a naturally-occurring amino sugar found in healthy joint tissue. Sadly, as we get older our bodies become less efficient at producing these essential nutrients to keep us active. It is known as 'the cement of the connective tissue' playing an important role in everyday rebuilding of the connective tissues around the joints, tendons, ligaments and it stimulates the production of cartilage. Health Perception GlucOsamax has changed... You may have noticed that Health Perception GlucOsamax has now changed to Ransom Jointflex. A few years ago the company and brand Health Perception was bought by William Ransom&Son, a company with over 160 years experience in natural extracts and health products. Whilst we've changed the pack to reflect this, please be assured that this is the same high quality product you know and love. For more information about William Ransom&Son visit www.williamransom.com. Why are there 3 levels shown for glucosamine? You may find glucosamine explained in 3 different ways on pack although not all packs will show all 3. This can be very confusing so to keep it simple and allow you to compare like with like, we recommend that you compare mg/tablet not just[/tablet using glucosamine sulphate as your base.

Crabtree&Evelyn is inspired by John Evelyn, a 17th century renaissance Englishman who was a visionary of his time. One of the first naturalists, Evelyn traveled Europe experiencing the wonderful cultures and natural environments, which he then shared with his friends and British society. Evelyn's personal motto""Explore Everything, Keep the Best""provided the inspiration from our founding to this day. Our icon, the Crabapple, is native to Britain and it is the ancestor of all cultivated apple trees. It represents beauty and the source of natural goodness inherent in our brand.

IDEAL FOR: Those who desire to whiten teeth safely. Those who desire healthier gums and teeth. Those who suffer from halitosis (bad breath). Those with biological surface (extrinsic) staining i.e. tea, coffee, nicotine, red wine. Those with excessive calculus. Teenagers with erosion and uncontrolled caries. 24/7 care for sensitive teeth. Dentist recommended brand. Specially formulated for people with sensitive teeth. Helps restore natural whiteness. It gently and effectively helps remove stains restoring teeth to their natural whiteness. It removes plaque with regular brushing and contains fluoride to prevent decay. Its minty taste keeps mouth feeling clean and fresh. Sensodyne Gentle Whitening is a low abrasion, fluoride containing toothpaste that, when used twice a day, provides 24/7 care for sensitive teeth. Why use Sensodyne Gentle Whitening? Sensodyne Gentle Whitening toothpaste has been specially formulated for people with sensitive teeth. Exposed areas of porous dentine can be prone to discolouration as well as sensitivity. With fluoride to help prevent tooth decay, this low abrasion toothpaste has been formulated to remove stains gently yet effectively, restoring teeth to their natural whiteness. What is tooth sensitivity? Teeth are protected by a hard layer of enamel. If this is damaged or worn away then the dentine underneath may become exposed and this can cause pain. How is tooth sensitivity caused? Gum recession exposing dentine at the gum line. Enamel erosion caused by fizzy, sweet and/or acidic drinks. Wearing away of the enamel caused by over-enthusiastic brushing. These factors can make your teeth hypersensitive to heat, cold, sweetness, acidity or just when brushing. Number one dentist recommended brand for sensitive teeth. Dentists have been recommending Sensodyne for many years.

Now that you have your new dentures, you may notice some differences in your mouth. You may experience the following: You feel less confident to speak or laugh. You feel you have less room for your tongue. Eating hard foods may be difficult. Food tastes different. Your dentures may seem big. You produce more saliva than normal. These are completely normal reactions! Fixodent can help! The sense of strangeness will disappear in time, once you (and your body) get used to your dentures. FIXODENT, LIFE WITH MORE BITE! Free yourself of the worry of thinking about your dentures!
